headline: Interpublic Declares Common Stock Dividend
summary: New York, NY, July 28, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Interpublic Group (NYSE: IPG) today announced that the company’s Board of Directors has declared a quarterly dividend on IPG common stock of $0.33 per share, payable on September 16, 2025, to holders of record at the close of business on September 2, 2025. # # # About InterpublicInterpublic (NYSE: IPG) (www.interpublic.com) is a values-based, data-fueled, and creatively-driven provider of marketing solutions. headline: Robert Half International Stock Plunges 6.1% Since Q2 Earnings Beat
summary: RHI beats Q2 estimates but posts lower earnings and revenues, with Talent Solutions weakness leading to a 6.1% stock drop.

headline: Booz Allen's Stock Remains Flat Since Fiscal Q1 Earnings Beat
summary: BAH posts higher margins, with Q1 EPS beating estimates. However, revenue dip and weaker backlog metrics cloud the fiscal 2026 outlook.
